item.title: The Future of Tesla's Energy Products
item.description:
Tesla’s Growing Energy Business

While Tesla is primarily known for its electric vehicles, the company’s energy products are becoming an increasingly important part of its business model and mission to accelerate the transition to sustainable energy.

Powerwall

The Tesla Powerwall is a rechargeable lithium-ion battery stationary home energy storage product. The Powerwall stores electricity for solar self-consumption, time-based control, and backup power.

Solar Roof

Tesla’s Solar Roof integrates solar panels directly into roof tiles, offering a seamless look while generating electricity. The Solar Roof is designed to be more durable than conventional roofing materials and comes with a 25-year warranty.
